message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. If you don't buy it, I'll sell it to someone else, and you'll miss out on a great opportunity.
I'm not going to buy it. I'd rather wait for the next round and see what other options I have.

I'm not interested in your counteroffer. I'll wait for the next round and see if I can get a better deal.

I appreciate the hint, but I'm still not convinced. I'd rather not overpay for a product that might not be worth the full $1200000 to me.
